Package com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.mobilegateway.listener

Interface MGDigitizationListener

public interface MGDigitizationListener
The MGDigitizationListener class is used for digitize card events.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onActivationRequired(PendingCardActivation pendingCardActivation)
    [Optional] After the selection of the IDV method, the end user will receive an OTP according to the method chosen.
    void
    onComplete(String digitalCardId)
    This is the last method called by MG SDK to signal the end of card enrollment process.
    void
    onCPSActivationCodeAcquired(String digitalCardId, byte[] activationCode)
    The MG server may give the activation code that is necessary to enroll the digitized card to CPS SDK for card installation.
    void
    onError(String digitalCardId, MobileGatewayError error)
    In cases where an error occurs, this method will be called.
    void
    onSelectIDVMethod(IDVMethodSelector idvMethodSelector)
    When this method is invoked, the end user will be prompted to select from the list of IDV methods such as Email and SMS.

  • Method Details

    • onCPSActivationCodeAcquired

      void onCPSActivationCodeAcquired(String digitalCardId, byte[] activationCode)
      The MG server may give the activation code that is necessary to enroll the digitized card to CPS SDK for card installation. As soon as this method is called, MPA sends the information to CPS SDK to initiate the enrollment process.
      Parameters:
      digitalCardId - The unique digital ID of the card.
      This digitized card ID, which is different from the token ID, is shared by the HCE platform components.
      activationCode - The activation code obtained from the digitize card request. For security purpose, MPA will securely wipe the activation code after use.

    • onSelectIDVMethod

      void onSelectIDVMethod(IDVMethodSelector idvMethodSelector)
      When this method is invoked, the end user will be prompted to select from the list of IDV methods such as Email and SMS.
      Parameters:
      idvMethodSelector - Provides the list of IDV methods for selection.

    • onActivationRequired

      void onActivationRequired(PendingCardActivation pendingCardActivation)
      [Optional] After the selection of the IDV method, the end user will receive an OTP according to the method chosen. This is required by MG SDK to continue the flow to activate the card. However, this callback is optional depending on the chosen IDV method.
      Parameters:
      pendingCardActivation - The pending card to be activated.

    • onComplete

      void onComplete(String digitalCardId)
      This is the last method called by MG SDK to signal the end of card enrollment process.
      Parameters:
      digitalCardId - The unique digital ID of the card.
      This digitized card ID, which is different from the token ID, is shared by the HCE platform components.

    • onError

      void onError(String digitalCardId, MobileGatewayError error)
      In cases where an error occurs, this method will be called.
      Parameters:
      digitalCardId - The unique digital ID of the card.
      This digitized card ID, which is different from the token ID, is shared by the HCE platform components.
      error - This error is returned when there is a problem performing card digitization.
